text: Serena most commonly refers to: * Serena Williams (born 1981), professional tennis player Serena may also refer to: ==Arts, entertainment, and media== * Serena (1962 film), a British crime thriller * Serena (2014 film), an American drama film starring Jennifer Lawrence and Bradley Cooper * Serena (2016 film), a TV documentary about the tennis player Serena Williams * Serena (novel), by Ron Rash * Serena Maneesh, a rock band ==Brands and enterprises== *Nissan Serena, a people carrier/minivan *Serena Hotels *Serena Software ==People== ===Surname=== * Aldo Serena, Italian football player * Bill Serena, American baseball player * Fernando Serena, Spanish football player * Gustavo Serena, Italian actor and film director * Michele Serena, Italian football player * Ottavio Serena (1837–1914), Italian politician, judge, prefect and historian ===Given name=== *Serena (name) ==Places== *Serena, Illinois *Serena, a water park in Lahnus, Espoo, Finland *Séréna, a town in Burkina Faso *Serena, a town in Southwestern Kenya *La Serena, Chile *Serena Township, LaSalle County, Illinois ==Other uses== *Costa Serena, a ship *Serena libre, an alcoholic cocktail *Serena's Song, a horse *Siren (mythology), a bird woman in Greek mythology *Serena, Samanthas identical twin cousin in Bewitched ==See also== *La Serena (disambiguation) *Sirena (journal), a journal of poetry and art
title: Serena
